name: Chidiya Udd!
description:
If you have grown up in India you have definitely played the game Chidiya Udd in your childhood. For those who didn't, Chidiya Udd is an indoor game popular in the Indian sub-continent. It is played between two or more children. The words ‘chidiya udd’ translate to ‘fly away bird.’


Though nothing can beat the experience of playing with your friends in front of you, I have tried to recreate the game on Figma. I hope you relive some childhood memories. If you do, please leave a comment below.


To know more about Chidiya Udd read study by Seema Periwal and Prof. Ravi Poovaiah from IDC, IIT Bombay.
